metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10187 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In radare2 2.5.0, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in the dalvik_opfunction (libr/anal/p/anal_dalvik.c). Remote attackers could leverage thisvulnerability to cause a denial of service via a crafted DEX file. Notethat this issue is different from CVE-2018-8809, which was patched earlier.

criterions.comment: radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
